subtitle: A rather different way to prepare potato salad.

method.text: Cook the potatoes in a pan of boiling salted water for 20-25 min until just tender. Drain well. Cool slightly. Peel and slice.
In a large frying pan, cook the bacon until crisp. Drain on kitchen paper. Crumble bacon.
Fry the onion in the bacon fat in the pan until soft.

Stir in the flour, sugar, celery salt and black pepper. Stir in water and vinegar. Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Stir in the potatoes, bacon and peas. Cook for 2-3 min until heated through.

title: Hot potato and pea salad
